name: Stripe Apps UI toolkit
description:
Stripe Apps lets you embed custom user experiences directly in the Stripe Dashboard. Our library of sample apps, components and patterns will help you design an app that is inline with Stripeâ€™s UI.


Learn more about Stripe Apps, or check out the docs.


Changelog

May 13, 2022

  • Banner: replaced Notice with Banner
  • Patterns: added custom lists, sign out
  • App examples: content updates


Apr 22, 2022

  • App examples: added 5 new app examples
  • Patterns: added authentication, loading, empty state, error/success messages, custom forms, and charts
  • Marketplace app listing: new guideline and assets for marketplace app listing


Apr 8, 2022

  • App dock: added to all sample pages
  • Button: new component usage guidance
  • Notice: new variants with correct text and button wrapping
  • Drawer: new variants
  • Tabs: new component and variants
  • General: Improved auto-layout behavior on components
